title: Aarya Diamond Gold Button Earrings
materials: Natural Diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and longevity.
features: Classic round button design, adorned with meticulously set natural diamonds. Features a floral motif crafted with precision, lending a touch of elegance. The intricate openwork design enhances the brilliance of the diamonds. Traditional yet contemporary, perfect for the modern South Indian woman.
colors: Warm Gold hue with dazzling white diamonds.
occasions: and special events like birthdays and anniversaries. Also perfect as a gift for loved ones.
description: Crafted with authentic 22K gold and brilliant natural diamonds. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees lasting shine and durability. Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear. A timeless design that transcends generations, making it a valuable addition to your jewelry collection. Offers excellent craftsmanship at an accessible price point.
